title: Introductory Remarks by Vice Chairman for Supervision Randal K. Quarles
content: For release on delivery  9:00 a.m. EDT  July 19, 2018      Introductory Remarks   (via prerecorded video)   by    Randal K. Quarles    Vice Chairman for Supervision    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    At the     Alternative Reference Rates Committee Roundtable   The Federal Reserve Bank of New York   New York, New York     July 19, 2018
